changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `vika_social_tenant` ( `id` bigint unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT 'primary key', `app_id` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT 'app ID', `app_type` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT 'app type(1: internal, 2: isv)', `tenant_id` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT 'corp ID', `contact_auth_scope` json DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'contact auth scope', `auth_info` json DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'auth info', `status` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT 'status(0: disable, 1: enable)', `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT 'creation time', `updated_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT 'update time', `is_deleted` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'deleted 1:yes 0: no', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE, UNIQUE KEY `uk_app_tenant` (`app_id`,`tenant_id`) USING BTREE, KEY `k_tenant_id` (`tenant_id`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT='tenant info table';
